title: What to expect from CES 2026, the annual show of all things tech
description: CES 2026 in Las Vegas highlights the latest technology for 2026. Artificial intelligence is central to innovations in robotics, healthcare, and mobility. Companies like Nvidia and AMD are presenting AI solutions. Expect new robots for homes and specialised uses.
content:

title: In 2026, venture capital’s hunger for AI will be insatiable
description: There’s also venture interest in fintech, space, and defense startups, but the big money’s still pushing into artificial intelligence.
content: More than half of all VC dollars—and 36% of total deals—now flow to AI companies, according to a recent Silicon Valley Bank report. Crunchbase recently reported that 14% of all global venture investment in 2025 went to AI giants OpenAI and Anthropic.... [2193 chars]

title: Group leads recovery from AI-led delusions
description: Reports of people developing dangerous delusions after extended conversations with artificial intelligence chatbots increased in 2025 after deaths, lawsuits and congressional investigations. But the attention has not produced answers to the most pressing questions for those emerging from spells of AI-induced delusion: How do you get better? And who can you talk to about it?

title: AI aids in cancer prevention tests at MUSC
description: Artificial intelligence is making its way into every aspect of life, including cancer prevention. New technology at MUSC is speeding up reading tests.
content: They look like random clots of circles, some larger some smaller, arranged in symmetrical panes stacked one upon another on the screen. But it is not abstract art: it is Artificial Intelligence in medicine, which is already making a difference in can... [5225 chars]

description:

title: LG Electronics to unveil AI home robot LG CLOiD at CES 2026
description: South Korean technology giant LG Electronics Inc. is set to debut its next-generation artificial intelligence home robot, LG CLOiD, at the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) starting Tuesday in Las Vegas, United States, as per a report by Pulse, the English service of Maeil Business News Korea.

title: The Future Is Here: AI-Generated Police Report Claims Officer Turned into Frog
description: In an embarrassing incident highlighting the pitfalls of relying on artificial intelligence in law enforcement, the police department in Heber City, Utah, was forced to explain why a police report generated by AI claimed a responding officer had transformed into a frog.
